name: Anti-Summoning Shield
text: Within the area of effect, this spell impedes the use of spells of the summoning subschool and other effects that summon creatures. Any such spells, spell-like abilities, or similar summoning effects used within the area have a percent chance of failure equals 5% × your caster level, to a maximum 75% chance of failure. If the summoning effect already has a percent chance of failure (as is often the case with the summon spell-like ability of outsiders), these percentages stack. This spell does not affect summoners attempting to summon their eidolon, but it does affect summoners casting other summoning spells.
text_zh: 这种法术会妨碍效果范围内的召唤子学派法术和其他会召唤出生物的效果。任何此类的法术，类法术能力，或相似的召唤效果，如果在区域内被使用，则会有5%×你的施法者等级的失败几率，最高为75%的失败率。如果召唤效果本来就已经有一个百分失败率（通常情况下是异界生物的召唤型类法术能力），这些百分比几率会叠加。这种法术不会影响召唤师试图召唤他们的幻灵，但法术能影响召唤师施展的其他召唤法术。
